column5: Well once again I noticed someone hit the many thousand button.  Glen since I have sighned up on the board in November I have enjoyed your many posts.  You have had some sad times and pulled through them.  Most of all you make alot of us Laugh  Love your reports and I look forward to meeting you some day.  One day we may see a pic without those glasses on  MTP

Well thanks for noticing Mike!  I hope I've aded something to this board... other than being the "Token" Redneck. I enjoy this place and have made many friends here, I look forward to meeting the OFNers I've never met and seeing the ones I have met again!!!  ... if you see me without my glasses on.... I won't be able to see you!
WOW!!!  It's great to have you around here G.  I love all your posts - Mr. Wiggly.  Joey
I've had about enough of his crap...can we vote him off the island? Joe
Sounds like somebody needs a Prozac and a nap!
GCD, one of my favourite OFC'ers.
You can celebrate by smoking 5 or 6 packs of   smokes!
Wow, that is a whole lot of posts for the resident "Bubba"! Way to go!
3,000 posts!! GCD wore out the spellcheck when this board was in the 2.1.7 version. Forced us to upgrade to 2.2.2 for a stronger system.
A true southern gentleman and a pillar of the community! Glen, PM me for the address to send the check.LOL Nice job Glen!
Always knew he was full of hot air   , but I'll still fish with ya glen  Maureen

I am not so impressed I have seen a chicken that can play the piano so why not a redneck who can type??? Thanks for all of the great posts Glen and getting alot of people thru the winter with your softwater reports.  Art
Good going GCD, I have read many of your posts and enjoyed them.  Regards, Sam

Glenn.you may be a Token Redneck  lol. Thats way better than wanting to be a Coonass,like others we know,  Will not mention name cause he knows who he is.  Oh by the way Glenn did I say you reached 3000 post congrats.  Steve
One thing's for sure, if it weren't for Glen, the air in here would be a lot cooler,   But seriously, congrats on reaching a new pinnacle on OFC Glen.
3000 posts? I didn't think that Glen knew 3000 words.  All kidding aside, congrats Bud. Looking forward to the next 3000.
3000 post!  Dawg does have a way of growing on ya!  Always good for a laugh, Thanks Glen  Whopper
Atta Boy Glen  .. Jolly good show OLD man  Keep them coming
Hey shirt off an all! love them reports!  UF
Yea, I guess you're OK for a Johnny Reb....  GCD's theme song
